name: Flip 3310
description:
Flip the burgers and don't let them burn! The aim was to create a Nokia-like game for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3.

Controls :

- Q, W, E, A, S, D  (Each represent a cooking hob)

- Press the hob key immediately as it starts vibrating (Cooked)

- Don't spam, it gets harder!!!

Credits :
Pelumi (Xadegamer) - Programming
Jack HK - Graphics
Miguel - Intro music & SFX
